title: Vladimir Skin ( Summer Theme )
body:
A few mates of mine where discussing about the recently announced skins that are coming up. We weren't looking forward to them as we started to think of some. My personal Favourite would be Vladimir as we can see a Summer or pool party theme for him.

He holds a Water Ballon like he does with the blood  in his default skin. He is Shirtless and wears board shorts and a towel wrapped around his waist. He wears a massive Sun Hat and a pair of sunglasses. I know he isn't a vampire but it would be a nice and fun mix to add. 

Particle Effects:

Q can be a towel whip lash as he damages and flings his towel back healing him

W can form a Kid's Wadding pool like those inflatable pools. Can have maybe a Rubber duck or floaters inside the pool.

E can end up being the Water Balloons thrown at the surrounding enemies that get in range of him.

R Finally his ult was tricky to think of but maybe massive splash of water where he casts. 

Recall would be him jumping in the pool but he falls in like its deeper than it looks from the summoner's point of view. it was tricky to think of but some comedic act would be something fun within this skin. i am no artist but hopefully later on i may add a concept idea for it.


I love Vlad as a champion and i like his legendary and his Soul Stealer skin. But if this skin was made it would be my top favourite.
